headline: Tutor Perini (TPC) Valuation Check After US$53 Million Honolulu Rail Change Order
summary: Tutor Perini (TPC) recently announced a change order worth about US$53 million for Honolulu’s City Center Guideway and Stations Project, which expands its design role on the rail extension between Kaka'ako and Ala Moana. See our latest analysis for Tutor Perini. The Honolulu change order lands at a time when momentum has been building, with a 1-day share price return of 3.52% taking the stock to US$71.79 and sitting alongside a 12.91% 90-day share price return and a 3-year total shareholder...
